Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraAccount
Namespace: "urn:zimbraAccount"
ModifyZimletPrefs SOAP Command

Modify Zimlet Preferences

Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required false

ModifyZimletPrefsRequest

    <ModifyZimletPrefsRequest> ## ModifyZimletPrefsRequest
        (<zimlet name="..." presence="..." /> ## ModifyZimletPrefsSpec)*
    </ModifyZimletPrefsRequest>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <ModifyZimletPrefsRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/zimlet Optional (0 or more) Zimlet Preference Specifications
/zimlet@name Required (only 1) Type:String
Zimlet name
/zimlet@presence Required (only 1) Type:String
Zimlet presence setting
Valid values : "enabled" | "disabled"

ModifyZimletPrefsResponse

    <ModifyZimletPrefsResponse> ## ModifyZimletPrefsResponse
        (<zimlet>{zimlets} (String)</zimlet>)*
    </ModifyZimletPrefsResponse>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <ModifyZimletPrefsResponse> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/zimlet Optional (0 or more) Type:{zimlets} (String)
Zimlets
